mapper.insert: insert into tb_file_link(file_link_addr, file_id, file_link_access_times, create_time, last_edit_time, file_link_password) VALUES (#{fileLinkAddr}, #{file.fileId}, #{fileLinkAccessTimes}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{fileLinkPassword});
mapper.select: select fl.file_link_id, fl.file_link_addr, fl.file_id, fl.file_link_access_times, fl.create_time, fl.last_edit_time, fl.file_link_password, fl.file_link_valid_time, f.file_id from tb_file_link as fl, tb_file as f where fl.file_id = f.file_id and fl.file_link_id = #{linkId};

select fl.file_link_id, fl.file_link_addr, fl.file_id, fl.file_link_access_times, fl.create_time, fl.last_edit_time, fl.file_link_password, fl.file_link_valid_time, f.file_id from tb_file_link as fl, tb_file as f where fl.file_id = f.file_id and fl.file_id = #{fileId};

select fl.file_link_id, fl.file_link_addr, fl.file_id, fl.file_link_access_times, fl.create_time, fl.last_edit_time, fl.file_link_password, fl.file_link_valid_time, f.file_id from tb_file_link as fl, tb_file as f where fl.file_id = f.file_id and fl.file_link_addr = #{linkAddr};
